name: CHRISTMAS SEASON 6 DVD SUBSCRIPTION OFFER- LIMITED TIME!
description:
G'day folks,

There's nothing quite like Christmas, particularly if (like me) you've got three young kids that are just hanging out for the big day. The excitement in their eyes, even when we're setting up the Chrissy lights on the roof, is just awesome. 

The MR4X4 shop always fires right into gear around Christmas too, and it gives me great joy to know that people value our magazines, DVDs and books enough to want to give them to loved ones at Christmas. 

And in a breakthrough for us this year, our brand new Season 6 DVD Boxed Set will be available for Christmas. And if you pick up this product before XMAS, you'll be the very first to see the entire season of the show, because at least three of the episodes won't have aired yet! Plus, our Season 6 boxed set has a whole host of extra footage. The Gunbarrel Highway episode alone has around 20 minutes of extra stories, that we just couldn't fit into the TV cut. Other episodes also feature some great extra stories, and, every episode also features a wonderful slideshow, shot by our professional stills photographers. 

We've bolted this great new product to our magazine for a one week special. If you purchase this Season 6 DVD boxed set for $59.95, for just $10 extra we'll throw in a one year subscription to Pat Callinan's 4X4 Adventures magazine. It's a cracker of a deal, and will hopefully make your Christmas something special. 

From my family, and the MR4X4 crew, I hope you have a wonderful Christmas and that Santa makes all of your 4X4 touring dreams come true. 

Keep the shiny side up!

Cheers,

Pat

This deal comes with EXPRESS Postage of $14.95 but due to Christmas Postage delays we cannot guarantee delivery for December 25th.
Offer closes December 24th.

name: FAMILY HOLIDAY SURVIVAL PACK
description:
It's hard to get a better, more practical education than on the road with the family. Of course, you do need to be armed with the right tools to stop the infernal “are we there yets?"

With this in mind, we’ve come up with a Family Holiday Survival Pack, that will sort out not just the kids, but the adults as well (particularly on those long road trips). Here's what you'll get:

*Four-issue subscription to “Pat Callinan’s 4X4 Adventures “ magazine. Australia's premium 4WD magazine – say no more. 
Valued at $47.80

* HEMA Kids Wildlife Atlas: an activity book, atlas and whiteboard all in one. 20 easy-to-read atlas pages littered with wildlife themed games, activities and puzzles with wipe-clean pages and a free re-useable pen: so your kids can trace the journey and have loads of fun at the same time!

* Australia Road and 4WD Atlas the complete atlas for on and off-road navigation. Includes A HEMA road atlas with regional and suburban maps with indicated camping areas, caravan parks, 24 hour fuel stops and rest areas, city maps with accommodation options and a 4WD section which includes mapping of Cape York, Fraser Island, High Country Victoria, the Flinders Ranges, Central Australia, the Top End, the Kimberley and the Pilbara. 
Valued at $34.95

*  Bonus Gulf Country DVD. This superb DVD captures the beauty and adventure of a part of Australia that few get to see. From Pat Callinan's 4X4 Adventures Season 1. 
Valued at $14.95

We have a limited number of these Family Packs for the special price of $69.99  + $14.95 P+H. Valued at $107.70, That’s a saving of $37.71!

This offer is also available to existing customers with a subscription renewal.

name: The New South Wales 4X4 Collection- 7 Disc Set
description:
New South Wales has everything to offer the four wheel driver, no matter where you choose to explore. Whether you are looking for adventure a stone's throw from Sydney or planning an extended trek with the family, you'll find the perfect destination whichever direction you choose.

Take in the scenic beaches and hinterlands of the Mid North Coast or take a run through the historic Turon River region near Bathurst, meander up the Darling River run and see the amazing China Walls in the Mungo National Park, or head south to explore the lush green forests and steep escarpments of the southern coastal region. For  adventure lovers, there's the Corner Country with its red sands, blue skies and friendly locals and all these destinations are here in this one, handy set.

Ride along with Pat Callinan as he shares some of his favourite New South Wales treks with you. Allow yourself to be enticed by the magnificent tracks and locations, and learn from Australia's foremost 4WD expert as he shows you how to travel Australia from behind the wheel of your 4WD.

This pack contains the following episodes from Seasons 3,4 and 5 of Pat Callinan's 4X4 Adventures:
Blue Mountains, The NSW South Coast, Outback NSW, Bathurst to the Blue Mountains, Mid North Coast, Barrington to the Beach, Corner Country.

Only $39.95
+ $7.95 Postage & Handling for orders Australia wide

name: The Southern States 4X4 Collection- 7 Disc Set
description:
If you live in the glorious Southern States of Australia, you'll already know how beautiful these areas are, but they are also teeming with amazing four wheel drive adventures just waiting to be had. This pack combines the best that Victoria, South Australia and Tasmania have to offer.

South Australia's limestone Coast is home to the mouth of the mighty Murray River and, of course, the famous sand hills of Robe! Head north and you're in the stunning Flinders Ranges, a historic journey for all the family. Across the border into Victoria, you can't go past the Victorian High Country with its crisp, clear streams and views from the top of Blue Rag.

A little closer to Melbourne is the amazing Jamieson region, offering a great short jaunt to get you out of the city for the weekend. And when you've had enough of the Melbourne Loop, jump on a ferry across to Tasmania and its stunning contrasting landscapes.

Join Pat Callinan as he shares his favourite Southern State destinations with you. Allow yourself to be enticed by the magnificent tracks and locations, and learn from Australia's foremost 4WD expert as he shows you how to travel Australia from behind the wheel of your 4WD.

This pack contains the following episodes from Seasons 3,4 and 5 of Pat Callinan's 4X4 Adventures:
Melbourne Loop, Beyond Hotham, Tasmania- Part 1, Tasmania- Part 2, Limestone Coast, The Flinders Ranges and Oodnadatta Track.

Only $39.95
+ $7.95 Postage & Handling for orders Australia wide

name: The Queensland 4X4 Collection- 5 Disc Set
description:
Queensland has some of the best four wheel driving in the country, so its no wonder many places are on everyone's wish list. Many of them are close to major cities, but if it's a big trip you are after, Queensland has it all!

Both Fraser and Moreton Islands are regular stops for the locals, and once you arrive, you'll understand why. Further up the coast you can explore the Cooloola National Park, then head inland to the iconic Glasshouse Mountains.

For the explorer in you, the Queensland Outback offers a slice of Australia that everyone needs to experience at least once in their lifetime- it's a great big dose of "hooves, horns and ancient history".

So ride along with pat Callinan as he shares some of his all-time favourite Queensland destinations, and soak up some classic Australian adventure. Along the way, you'll learn from Australia's foremost 4WD expert as he shows you how to travel Australia from behind the wheel of your 4WD.

This pack contains the following episodes from Seasons 3,4 and 5 of Pat Callinan's 4X4 Adventures:
Outback QLD, Cape York- Parts 1&2, Moreton Island, Fraser Island, Corner Country, Glasshouse Mountains to the Cooloola Coast, Simpson Desert, Being First is Forever.

Only $39.95
+ $7.95 Postage & Handling for orders Australia wide

name: The Outback Favourites 4X4 Collection- 8 Disc Set
description:
If you've got red dirt in your veins, then this is the boxed set for you! This compliation of Outback adventures is a great way to start planning your adventure, or simply rekindle your love of our sunburnt country.

The Flinders Ranges offers some of the greatest tracks in the country and eagle-eye views that go on forever. There's the iconic Corner Country and Outback QLD to explore, as well as the Canning Stock Route- that "I've gotta do that some day" trek over in Western Australia. On top of this, there's the Oodnadatta Track and the epic journey across the 1100 dunes of the Simpson Desert. We've even included our documentary of the reenactment of the first vehicle crossing of the Simpson- "Being First is Forever."

So, jump aboard with Pat Callinan as he takes you out to where the "real Australia" lies, showing you the kind of places that make Australia what it is. Allow yourself to be enticed by the magnificent tracks and locations, and learn from Australi's foremost 4WD expert as he shows you how to travel Australia from behind the wheel of your 4WD.

This pack contains the following episodes from Seasons 2,3 and 5 of Pat Callinan's 4X4 Adventures:
Flinders Ranges, Red Centre, Outback NSW, Outback QLD, Canning Stock Route- Parts 1 & 2, Corner Country, Simpson Desert & Oodnadatta Track, Being First is Forever.

Only $39.95
+ $7.95 Postage & Handling for orders Australia wide

name: The Western Australia 4X4 Collection- 5 Disc Set
description:
Western Autralia is a four wheel drivers paradise, one that you will return to again and again. The changes in this vast landscape from East to West and North to South are enough to keep even the most dedicated traveller guessing what's around the corner.

Sit back and explore Western Australia's most stunning 4X4 destinations with Pat Callinan's 4X4 Adventures. This pack is a collection of some of the most amazing places that Western Australia has to offer, from the beautiful beaches and landscapes of the kimberley and Pilbara in the far north, across the endless deserts of ochre sand on the Canning Stock Route to the turquoise seas teeming with wildlife, unique to this ever changing region, down at Esperance.

Ride along with Pat Callinan as he shares some of his favourite Western Australia Treks with you. Allow yourself to be enticed by the magnificent tracks and locations, and learn from Australia's foremost expert as he shows you how to travel Australia from behind the wheel of your 4WD.

This pack contains the following episodes from Seasons 2 and 4 of Pat Callinan's 4X4 Adventures:
Pilbara to the Coral Coast, The Kimberley, Esperance to Kalgoorlie, Canning Stock Route Part 1, Canning Stock Route Part 2.

Only $39.95
+ $7.95 Postage & Handling for orders Australia wide

name: The Top End 4X4 Collection- 5 Disc Set
description:
The Top End of Australia is often referred to as "Australia's Final Frontier", but all we can tell you is that it's a heck of a great place to explore!

Cape York is the trip on everyone's wish list. Test your skills and learn some new ones along the way, as Pat offers tips and tricks to keep you moving. And once you are done with the Cape, there's more to be had by heading west.

Kakadu and Litchfield offer a blend of excitement and the comforts of well-run National Park facilities, perfect for those new to the 4X4 lifestyle. But if it's azure seas and red sands you are after, head west to the Kimberley and Pilbarra regions.
This pack offers the best of the Top End, with some of the most stunning scenery you'll ever see. Allow yourself to be enticed by the magnificent tracks and locations, and learn from Australia's foremost 4WD expert as Pat shows you how to travel Australia from behind the wheel of your 4WD.

This pack contains the following episodes from Seasons 3,4 and 5 of Pat Callinan's 4X4 Adventures:
Kakadu, Litchfield, Kimberley region, Cape York- Part 1, Cape York- Part 2.

Only $39.95
+ $7.95 Postage & Handling for orders Australia wide

name: Being First is Forever Documentary (The First Simpson Desert Crossing)
description:
Being First is Forever is a must see documentary, not only for off-roading enthusiasts but for every Australian who has ever dared to dream of conquering the unknown.
This is the true story and commemoration of one of man's greatest off-roading feats, the first crossing of the Simpson Desert by a motor vehicle by intrepid geologist Reg Sprigg, his wife and children in a Nissan Patrol.

$14.95 + postage and handling of $7.95 (Australia Only)

THIS DVD IS ALSO INCLUDED IN THE SEASON 5 BOX SET, THE OUTBACK FAVOURITES 4X4 COLLECTION AND THE QUEENSLAND 4X4 COLLECTION.

name: 4X4 Adventures- Advanced Guide
description:
"Pat Callinan's 4X4 Advanced Guide" is the second book in our 4X4Guide series. Inside is everything you need to move to the next level of 4X4 techniques and trip planning, and extend your touring enjoyment further.

In this book you will find:
- Recovery solutions for all terrain.
- Vehicle protection.
- Getting yourself out of trouble.
- Basic first aid techniques.
- Remote area survival.
- Power and communication options.
- Permits and reading topographic maps.
- Winching techniques.
- Avoiding insurance pitfalls.

Plus:
- Choosing the best accessories.
- UHF channels.
- Setting up your campsite kitchen.


ONLY $29.95

name: Back Order- Magazine Issue 1
description:
ISSUE 001 - The Collectors Edition - BEYOND HOTHAM 

When Issue 001 of Pat Callinan's 4X4 Adventures hit the market back in November 2011, we were extremely proud of what we had created; a beautifully written, photographed and designed magazine that was printed here in Australia with environmental care a major consideration.

We decided from day one that this magazine was going to set a new benchmark in the 4WD and touring publication field, and we sincerely believe - if the amazing feedback we received was any indication - that we hit the nail on the head.

NOTE: We are now running low on our stash of Issue 001 - once they are gone... they're gone for good! Don't miss out.

name: Back Order- Magazine Issue 2
description:
ISSUE 002 - THE KIMBERLEY 

Issue 002 was even better than Issue 001, and that's not just our opinion. Your positive feedback from Issue 001 made us take this one to the next level. 
We are extremely proud of what we have created; a beautifully written, photographed and designed magazine that was printed here in Australia with environmental care a major consideration.

We decided from day one that this magazine was going to set a new benchmark in the 4WD and touring publication field, and we sincerely believe - if the amazing feedback we are receiving is any indication - that we have exceeded even our own expectations. 

NOTE: There are not many of Issue 002 left - we can now see the floor in the front warehouse! If this Issue is missing from your collection - get in quickly so you don't miss out.

name: Back Order- Magazine Issue 3
description:
Issue 003 of Pat Callinan's 4X4 Adventures magazine carries on our mantra of 'the essence of 4X4 adventure'. With inspiring images, incisive stories and a built-in love of adventure, you won't want to miss out on adding Issue 003 to your collection! 

From amazing images of the beautiful Flinders Ranges, to Gavin Moody's photo essay on the Victorian High Country and Ian Glover's slant on the Wild Rivers dance with diplomacy, Pat Callinan's 4X4 Adventures magazine is pleasing to both the eye and mind.

NOTE: Uh oh... we are starting to see gaps of bare floor in the warehouse where this one is stacked, as well. Don't miss out!

name: 4WD Treks Close To Sydney book and Barrington to the Beach DVD
description:
A full-colour guide to 18 fantastic trips, this completely revised and expanded 5th Edition features eighteen of the best 4WD day and weekend treks within a few short hour's drive of Sydney. 

You'll discover some of Greater Sydney's best 4WD destinations with this easy to follow route noted guide. Route directions read in forward and reverse as well as featuring both GPS Lat/Long and UTM Grid References. 
Treks include: Yengo National Park, Abercrombie Trek, Tianjara Fire Trail, The Bridle Track, Dixons Long Point, Caves to Caves, Watagan Mountains, Sunny Corner Trek, Touring the Turon, Trek to Newnes, Baal Bone Gap, Stockton Beach, Chichester Forest, Barrington Tops and The Hunter Range. 

BONUS: Barrington to the Beach DVD included.


+ POSTAGE & HANDLING OF $12.95 (Australia Only)

name: 4X4 Adventures- Season 4 DVD Boxed Set
description:
All your favourite episodes from Season Four in a handy and stylish box set, perfect for giving or as a gift for yourself! 
The Season Four box set includes: 

The Kimberley WA 
Pilbara to the Coral Coast WA 
Limestone Coast SA 
Mid-North Coast NSW 
Cooloola to the Glasshouse Mountains QLD 
Beyond Hotham – High Country VIC 
Outback NSW 
Moreton Island QLD 

A great way to keep the kids (and big kids) entertained.

name: Mid-North Coast (Season 4)
description:
Just three hours north of Sydney lies the picturesque Mid-North Coast of NSW, with some of the best 4WDing and camping you could ask for; secret beaches, miles of white sand on which to drive and canopies of rainforest teeming with waterfalls and wildlife.

If you thought you knew this region, think again, as 'MR 4X4' shows you places and tracks never before seen on TV. Explore the Great Lakes and Hastings Valley regions and learn how to drive difficult terrain damage-free, drive safely at night and enjoy some great attractions of the area.

Trek Rating:  Easy/Medium

+ postage and handling of $4.95 (Australia Only)

THIS DVD ALSO FORMS PART OF THE SEASON 4 BOXED SET.

name: Limestone Coast (Season 4)
description:
Come with 'MR 4X4' Pat Callinan as he explores the wonders of the Limestone Coast of South Australia. Famous for the seemingly endless sands of the Coorong, the dunes of Robe and geological wonders like Tantanoola Caves and the Piccaninnie Ponds, this region offers an adventure not to be missed.

From the mouth of the mighty Murray River to the iconic town of Mount Gambier, Pat shares his tips and hints along the way.

Trek rating:  Easy/Medium

+ postage and handling of $4.95 (Australia Only)

THIS DVD ALSO FORMS PART OF THE SEASON 4 BOXED SET.

name: Pilbara to the Coral Coast (Season 4)
description:
Classed by many visitors as 'their favourite 4X4 destination of all time', the Pilbara will amaze with its ragged red ranges and breathtaking waterholes. With destinations like Karijini NP and the inviting pools and streams of Millstream Chichester NP, this trek along the Warlu Way simply cannot be missed.  Capping off this wonderful adventure is a journey out to the spectacular coastline of Exmouth and the Ningaloo Marine Park.

Learn how to safely negotiate the tracks and beaches of this remote region from Australia's foremost 4X4 expert.

Trek Rating: Easy

+ postage and handling of $4.95 (Australia Only)

THIS DVD ALSO FORMS PART OF THE SEASON 4 BOXED SET.

name: Moreton Island (Season 4)
description:
Accessible weekend getaways don't get much better than Moreton - an island paradise just 45 minutes ferry ride from Brisbane. Explore Moreton's beautiful bays and sandy beaches, rocky headlands and historic lighthouse; not to mention the Tangalooma Wrecks and beautiful Blue Lake. 
Pat and the family feed the wild dolphins at Tangalooma's Wild Dolphin Resort and blast down the steep dunes on a toboggan sand safari! With tips on everything from sand driving to tidal information and de-bogging techniques, 'MR 4X4' shows you how to get it right.

Trek rating:  Easy

+ postage and handling of $4.95 (Australia Only)

THIS DVD ALSO FORMS PART OF THE SEASON 4 BOXED SET.

name: Outback NSW (Season 4)
description:
If you're after a good dose of red dirt in your veins, join Pat as he follows the Darling River Run from Pooncarie to Broken Hill and on to Bourke.  Taking in places like Menindee Lakes, Mungo National Park, Silverton, the iconic Tilpa Hotel and Mutawintji National Park, you'll discover why this area is considered a must-see destination for all 4WD adventures. Along the way, Pat will show you Outback driving tips, along with techniques and hints to help you travel like a pro.

Trek Rating:  Easy

+ postage and handling $4.95 (Australia Only)

THIS DVD ALSO FORMS PART OF THE SEASON 4 BOXED SET.

name: Cooloola to the Glasshouse Mountains (Season 4)
description:
Come with Pat on a journey from the gorgeous beaches of Queensland's Cooloola Coast, to the spectacular forests of the Glasshouse Mountains.  With iconic 4WD destinations like Rainbow Beach, Inskip Point and Mount Mee, this is surely one of Australia's finest weekend getaways. 
Plus, learn how to drive the beach that has claimed more 4WDs than any other!  Along the way, Pat shows you some great tips on getting yourself out of trouble - be it on the sand or in the stunning terrain of the Glasshouse Mountains.

TREK RATING:  MEDIUM

+ POSTAGE & HANDLING OF $4.95 (Australia Only)

name: Beyond Hotham (Season 4)
description:
A trip through the Victorian High Country is a journey back in time.  As one of Australia's most popular 4X4 destinations, join Pat as he takes in the amazing views from the Blue Rag Range, explores the ruins and history of Wonnangatta Station and shares the secrets of Eagle Vale Hut, Dargo, Talbotville and the Red Jacket Mine.
Learn from Australia's 'MR 4X4' as he shares his tips on driving the steep terrain of the High Country around Hotham, from tyre tips to nifty hints.

Trek Rating: Medium

+ postage and handling of $4.95 (Australia Only)

THIS DVD ALSO FORMS PART OF THE SEASON 4 BOXED SET.

name: 4X4 Adventures Work Shirt- Ocean Blue (limited stock)
description:
Blue Dog brand long sleeved work shirt in Ocean Blue - complete with the Pat Callinan's 4X4 Adventures embroidered logo.

Available sizes:  XL, 2XL, 3XL and 4XL.

Please allow 21 days for delivery of your order.

name: "I'd Rather Be Outback" Unisex T-Shirt
description:
This great 100% cotton T-Shirt is tough enough to handle the bush, and cool enough for the beach. Comes in a neutral Olive colour that will suit everyone.

Available in sizes Large, Small, XL and 2XL.

name: Top End Adventure- 2 Disc Set (Season 3)
description:
The Northern Territory’s Top End is a place of international significance; yet it’s only when you start exploring the backblocks of this region by 4WD, that you discover its true character.  
Jump on-board with Australia’s ‘MR4X4’ Pat Callinan, as he takes you to places that you can only access with a 4X4. From breathtaking waterfalls and swimming holes, to amazing lookouts and Aboriginal rock art sites, these two adventures cannot be missed.

Kakadu - Koolpin Gorge - Jim Jim Falls - Twin Falls - Lost City - Blyth Homestead - Litchfield NP - Gregory NP - Reynolds River Track - Surprise Creek Falls - Humbert Track

Disc 1 – Kakadu by 4WD
Disc 2 – Litchfield & Beyond

Trek Rating: Medium

+ postage and handling $4.95 (Australia Only)

THIS DVD ALSO FORMS PART OF THE SEASON 3 BOXED SET.

name: Canning Stock Route- 2 Disc Set (Season 2)
description:
Australia’s ultimate four-wheel drive trek is surely the mighty Canning Stock Route in Western Australia. It's tough, it's remote, it's spectacular and it's packed full of pioneering history.  
This 1761km trek heads over more than 950 sand dunes and through seven deserts. Starting at Wiluna in Western Australia, and finishing at Bililuna, it's a once-in-a-lifetime experience through Australia's arid heartland.

Pat Callinan shows you what you need to know when travelling the Canning Stock Route, from fuel to fire safety to driving tips and techniques.  The perfect companion for any contemplating this epic four-wheel drive trek.

Wiluna - Kunawarritji - Calvert Ranges - Durba Springs - Wolfe Creek

Trek rating:  Hard

+ postage and handling of $4.95 (Australia Only)

THIS DVD ALSO FORMS PART OF THE SEASON 2 BOXED SET.

name: Tasmania by 4X4- 2 Disc Set (Season 2)
description:
In this two-disc set, explore some of the best off-the-beaten-track destinations Tasmania has on offer. The 'West Coast' disc tackles the magnificent coast tracks including the Arthur Pieman Conservation region, part of the Tarkine Wilderness.  Plus Pat and the crew visit Strahan, the Henty Sand dunes, Zeehan and the superb Montezuma Falls - Tasmania's highest waterfall.

Jacob's Ladder - Coles Bay - Pieman Heads - Strahan - Petal Point

Disc 1 - Tasmania's North West Coast
Disc 2 - Tasmania's North East Coast

TREK RATING: MEDIUM / HARD

Disc Two features the magnificent north east coast of Tasmania.  Visit Jacob's Ladder - Tasmania's highest road - before heading to Freycinet National Park and Coles Bay. The dirt road trek then snakes up the coast to Friendly Beaches, the Bay of Fires, before trekking into the Evercreech State Forest, home of the world's tallest white gum trees.  The journey then heads to Pyengana, home of a beer drinking pig, before checking out St Columba's Falls - a magnificent site set in an ancient rainforest.  The journey finishes with the breathtaking views of Petal Point.

Trek Rating:  Easy

+ postage and handling of $4.95 (Australia Only)

THIS DVD ALSO FORMS PART OF THE SEASON 2 BOXED SET.

name: Blue Mountains (Season 3)
description:
Just west of Sydney, the Blue Mountains are a veritable treasure trove for those with the keys to a 4X4.  Visit amazing areas of geological significance, like the Lost City and the Capertee Valley – the second biggest canyon in the world!  But that’s only the half of it.  With superb campsites, interesting historical sites (Newnes) and awesome characters, you’ll be blown away by the variety and accessibility of this region.

Lost City - Newnes - Glow Worm Tunnel - Mt Airly - Dunns Swamp

Trek Rating: Easy to Hard

+ postage and handling of $4.95 (Australia Only)

THIS DVD ALSO FORMS PART OF THE SEASON 3 BOXED SET.

name: Corner Country (Season 3)
description:
Few treks are better suited to the 4X4 beginner wanting to explore Australia’s remote outback, than the Corner Country. You’ll be inspired as you drive through a land that has changed little since European habitation. 
This is a place of brilliant red sand dunes, beautiful brown rivers and long gibber plains.  Pat and the crew camp beside Cooper Creek, near the famous ‘Dig Tree’ where explorers Burke & Wills perished.  This really is essential 4X4 touring.

Haddon Corner - Cordillo Downs - Dig Tree - Innamincka - Strzelecki Track - Cameron Corner

“A whole lot more than just the junction of states – this is pure outback”

Trek Rating:  Easy (in dry weather)

+ postage and handling of $4.95 (Australia Only)

THIS DVD ALSO FORMS PART OF THE SEASON 3 BOXED SET.

name: Flinders Ranges Experience (Season 3)
description:
The Flinders Ranges is one of Australia’s most spectacular 4X4 destinations.  
The driving here is nothing short of brilliant, and what’s more it’s fantastically easy to access. Pat and the crew take self-drive routes through Arkaroola and Willow Springs, driving ridge tops and saddles that need to be seen to be believed. 
With it’s short drives through geological marvels, the Flinders Ranges should be on the top of your ‘to do’ list.  And with Pat’s expert tips on rock driving and more, this production is a classic that you won’t forget quickly.

Arkaroola - Italowie Gorge - Parachilna - Willow Springs - Skytrek

Trek Rating:  Medium

+ postage and handling of $4.95 (Australia Only)

THIS DVD ALSO FORMS PART OF THE SEASON 3 BOXED SET.

name: Outback Queensland (Season 3)
description:
Welcome to a land where outback stations are measured in square kilometres, not hectares; where ancient rivers run slow, and each sunset is better than the next. 
In this brilliant adventure, Pat and his family douse themselves in the unique lifestyle and features of Outback Queensland.  This is so much more than ‘big hat’ country. 
It’s a place of camel races, characters, dinosaur footprints and pioneering legends.

Birdsville - Bedourie - Windorah - Cooper Creek - Lark Quarry - Winton

Trek Rating: Easy(in dry weather)

+ postage and handling of $4.95 (Australia Only)

THIS DVD ALSO FORMS PART OF THE SEASON 3 BOXED SET.

name: Simpson Desert (Season 3)
description:
The Simpson Desert is surely one of Australia’s ‘must-do’ 4WD adventures.  Crossing 1100 sand dunes, this trek goes from Alice Springs NT to Birdsville, QLD, through one of Australia’s most formidable environments. 
Marvel at the scenery and the stories behind this unique slice of Australia, as you head on tour with ‘MR 4X4’, Pat Callinan. 
Visit Old Andado, learn driving tips and meet some great characters along the way.

Alice Springs - Old Andado - Mt Dare - Dalhousie Springs - French Line

Trek Rating: Hard

+ postage and handling of $4.95 (Australia Only)

THIS DVD ALSO FORMS PART OF THE SEASON 3 BOXED SET.

name: Barrington to the Beach (Season 2)
description:
Barrington Tops, around 3 hours north of Sydney, is the step-off point for this superb beginner's off-road journey. 
Explore ancient Antarctic Beech rainforests, superb lookouts, secluded waterfalls and sphagnum moss swamps. 
Then the journey heads coastal, arriving first at the delightful Samurai Beach and then the towering sand dunes of Stockton Beach, north of Newcastle. 
This episode is packed full of tips and techniques from beginners to experts, which will help you get more out of your next off-road adventure.

Moonan Brook - Dilgry Circle - Thunderbolt's Way - Stockton Beach

Trek Rating: Easy/Medium

+ postage and handling of $4.95 (Australia Only)

THIS DVD ALSO FORMS PART OF THE SEASON 2 BOXED SET.

name: Esperance to Kalgoorlie & Beyond (Season 2)
description:
In this journey of contrasts, you’ll visit places that only a four-wheel drive can take you.  From beaches with Australia's whitest sand at Cape Le Grand National Park, through to Burra Rock, Kalgoorlie and the amazing sculptures of Lake Ballard.  Also in this great episode, there's rock driving, beach recoveries and plenty of great off-road driving tips from Australia's MR4X4 - Pat Callinan.

Cape Le Grand - Burra Rock - Kalgoorlie - Lake Ballard

Trek Rating: Easy

+ postage and handling of $4.95 (Australia Only)

THIS DVD ALSO FORMS PART OF THE SEASON 2 BOXED SET.

name: Red Centre Adventure (Season 2)
description:
Few places capture the imagination of the four-wheel driver as much as the red heart of Australia. 
In this inspirational journey, Pat Callinan takes you to places where only a four-wheel drive can go. 
As well as showing you location highlights, this DVD is packed full of informative tips on travelling in this arid region of Australia.

Palm Valley - MacDonnell Ranges - Arltunga - Outback Stations - Boggy Hole

Trek Rating:  Easy/Medium

+ postage and handling of $4.95 (Australia Only)

THIS DVD ALSO FORMS PART OF THE SEASON 2 BOXED SET.

name: Cape York (Season 1)
description:
Daintree - Telegraph Track - Elim Beach - Twin Falls - Punsand Bay

Cape York is arguably Australia's most inspirational 4X4 destination.  A rugged trek across rivers, log bridges and up stunning isolated beaches.  Join Pat Callinan, one of Australia's most experienced four-wheel drivers as he takes you to all of Cape York's hotspots, from the Bloomfield Track to the Telegraph Track, plus plenty of breathtaking side-tours.  Learn plenty of great tips and techniques for your very own trek to Australia's northernmost point.

Trek Rating:  Medium

+ postage and handling of $4.95 (Australia Only)

THIS DVD ALSO FORMS PART OF THE SEASON 1 BOXED SET.

name: Coffs Coast (Season 1)
description:
Few 4X4 destinations are as accessible and picturesque as the Coffs Coast, situated half-way between Brisbane and Sydney. 
We tackle a myriad of forest trails, taking us through old growth rainforests, stunning coastal scenery and beautiful creek crossings. From the whitewater of the Nymboida River through to the beautiful beaches of the Yuragir National Park (Pebbly Beach), this is a location that has to be seen to be believed.  With tracks of every description from easy to hardcore.

Pebbly Beach - Rover Trail - Platypus Flat - Mobong Falls

Trek Rating:  Easy/Medium

+ postage and handling of $4.95 (Australia Only)

THIS DVD ALSO FORMS PART OF THE SEASON 1 BOXED SET.

name: Fraser Island (Season 1)
description:
Explore the world's biggest sand island on a fantastic adventure from the south to the northern end of Fraser Island.  This trek takes in all of the must-see attractions like the Maheno shipwreck and Lake Mackenzie, as well as some amazing out-of-the-way hotspots, like the Valley of the Giants and Sandy Cape.

Lake Mackenzie - Sandy Cape - Eli Creek - Valley of the Giants

Trek Rating:  Easy

+ postage and handling of $4.95 (Australia Only)

THIS DVD ALSO FORMS PART OF THE SEASON 1 BOXED SET.

name: The Gulf Country (Season 1)
description:
Pat Callinan takes you to one of Australia's most remote 4X4 destinations - the Gulf of Carpentaria. 
This is a land of crocodiles, big fish and amazing bird life and Pat shows you the lot.
 From the stunning campsites of Adel's Grove and Kingfisher Camp, through to nature's marvels including Lawn Hill Gorge (Boodjamulla), Limmen River Fishing Camp, Butterfly Springs and Mataranka Thermal Springs, this adventure has the lot. 
Plus you'll find plenty of touring tips to keep you safe and comfortable on your journey.

Lawn Hill - Kingfisher Camp - Adel's Grove - Mataranka - Hell's Gate

Trek Rating:  Medium

+ postage and handling of $4.95 (Australia Only)

THIS DVD ALSO FORMS PART OF THE SEASON 1 BOXED SET.

name: The Kimberley (Season 1)
description:
Join Pat Callinan as he takes you where only a 4X4 can go, to The Kimberley region's most inspirational destinations. 
Fresh from the hit Network TEN television series, these shows take you to places off-the-beaten track that most people never see. 
Pat and the crew trek along the Gibb River Road, visiting cattle stations, thermal springs, fantastic gorges and local attractions.

Gibb River Rd - El Questro - Windjana Gorge - Bell Gorge - Cape Leveque

Trek Rating:  Medium

+ postage and handling of $4.95 (Australia Only)

THIS DVD ALSO FORMS PART OF THE SEASON 1 BOXED SET.

name: Victorian High Country (Season 1)
description:
The Victorian High Country is undoubtedly one of Australia's most spectacular and accessible 4X4 destinations. 
In this adventure, Pat takes you to the most stunning and historically significant destinations.  From Craig's Hut of "The Man From Snowy River" fame, through to the Wonnangatta Valley, Dandongadale Falls and the brilliant Blue Rag Range track. 
It's all in these two great episodes.

Also included are plenty of hints and tips for beginners to 4X4 experts.  There's tips on how to negotiate steep terrain, how to safely navigate water crossings, plus cold weather survival information. Plus there's an exclusive interview with a local legend.

Craig's Hut - Wonnangatta Valley - Lake Cobbler - Blue Rag Range

Trek Rating:  Medium/Hard (depending on the weather)

+ postage and handling of $4.95 (Australia Only)

THIS DVD ALSO FORMS PART OF THE SEASON 1 BOXED SET.
